Text:
Does this work with achievements?

afaik you need them for the game to work properly (to unlock new things)

@JARX

According to their steam page, there are no achievements.

There are unlockable classes in game, but that's about it.

There should be no problems and the game should work properly.
Works fine, things unlock as they should from what I can tell. You can't seen to be able to minimize the game at all, and it's always on top, which is slightly annoying, but hardly fatal.
Wow, Jeeez, dev guy already updated the game...
